rev.comment: This image use does not comply with [[WP:NFCC]] #10c and MUST be removed until it does. Thank you.

[[Image:Saddam Hussein on his throne.jpg|thumb|right|200px|Saddam Hussein with the [[Flag of Iraq#1991â2004|flag of Iraq]] he implemented during the [[Gulf War]]]]
 
[[Image:WeaponsInspector.JPG|thumb|right|250px|A UN weapons inspector in Iraq.]]
[[Image:WeaponsInspector.JPG|thumb|right|250px|A UN weapons inspector in Iraq.]]
[[Saddam Hussein]] initiated an extensive '''[[biological weapons]] (BW) program in [[Iraq]]''' in the early 1980s, in violation of the [[Biological Weapons Convention]] (BWC) of 1972. Details of the BW program â along with a chemical weapons program â surfaced only in the wake of the [[Gulf War]] (1990-91) following investigations conducted by the [[United Nations Special Commission]] (UNSCOM) which had been charged with the post-war disarmament of Saddam's Iraq. Because of this UN disarmament program, more is known today about the once-secret bioweapons program in Iraq than that of any other nation.
[[Saddam Hussein]] initiated an extensive '''[[biological weapons]] (BW) program in [[Iraq]]''' in the early 1980s, in violation of the [[Biological Weapons Convention]] (BWC) of 1972. Details of the BW program â along with a chemical weapons program â surfaced only in the wake of the [[Gulf War]] (1990-91) following investigations conducted by the [[United Nations Special Commission]] (UNSCOM) which had been charged with the post-war disarmament of Saddam's Iraq. Because of this UN disarmament program, more is known today about the once-secret bioweapons program in Iraq than that of any other nation.
